body:
I found out that the query method is the right for the approach. All scan filtering is done after the fetch from the database and would therefore never work.

I hope this can help others out:

const cityName = 'London'

const params = {
  TableName: 'Person',
  Limit: 5,
  IndexName: 'cityName-index',
  KeyConditionExpression: 'cityName = :x',
  ExpressionAttributeValues: {
    ':x': cityName
  }
}

// For pagination add the "ExclusiveStartKey" key to params
title: Conditional pagination using DynamoDB scan
